line: I enter the block, and see one of the cell beds occupied.
The thief-y blob turns to us with a heavy expression.

speaker: Thief
line: "Is that one linked to my luck today?"

speaker: Maid
line: "Yeah, he's the key to our freedom."

speaker: I
line: "I suppose we'll have to open the cell first."

speaker: Thief
line: "The guards around here should have it. They usually hang out in the storage area."
